Bradfod's Law and Library Acquisitions .A Goffman, W. Morris, T.G. Bradford's law holds for periodical circulation as well as literature dispersion. .X 14	1	1086 19	1	1086 31	1	1086 36	1	1086 37	1	1086 39	2	1086 40	1	1086 41	1	1086 46	1	1086 47	1	1086 55	2	1086 57	1	1086 65	1	1086 75	1	1086 76	1	1086 88	1	1086 97	1	1086 102	1	1086 103	1	1086 149	1	1086 153	1	1086 156	1	1086 162	1	1086 170	1	1086 175	1	1086 184	1	1086 193	1	1086 195	1	1086 196	1	1086 201	2	1086 203	1	1086 204	1	1086 205	1	1086 210	1	1086 213	1	1086 214	1	1086 215	1	1086 219	2	1086 221	1	1086 223	1	1086 225	1	1086 228	1	1086 229	1	1086 233	2	1086 253	1	1086 266	1	1086 267	1	1086 271	1	1086 313	1	1086 359	8	1086 377	1	1086 379	2	1086 382	1	1086 395	2	1086 494	1	1086 495	1	1086 505	2	1086 550	1	1086 554	1	1086 560	1	1086 573	2	1086 587	2	1086 588	1	1086 614	1	1086 618	1	1086 632	1	1086 635	1	1086 667	2	1086 748	5	1086 749	1	1086 750	2	1086 751	5	1086 759	1	1086 764	1	1086 765	2	1086 767	1	1086 777	1	1086 778	6	1086 779	1	1086 782	1	1086 787	1	1086 790	1	1086 791	3	1086 792	2	1086 793	2	1086 800	1	1086 804	2	1086 805	1	1086 893	2	1086 925	2	1086 952	2	1086 1010	1	1086 1016	2	1086 1019	1	1086 1028	1	1086 1030	1	1086 1055	1	1086 1061	1	1086 1071	1	1086 1081	1	1086 1082	1	1086 1083	5	1086 1085	8	1086 1086	18	1086 1087	3	1086 1090	2	1086 1147	1	1086 1182	2	1086 1200	1	1086 1201	3	1086 1274	1	1086 1275	1	1086 1277	1	1086 1278	2	1086 1280	1	1086 1282	1	1086 1285	2	1086 1287	1	1086 1295	1	1086 1297	1	1086 1301	1	1086 1302	3	1086 1304	1	1086 1313	1	1086 1338	1	1086 1344	1	1086 1347	1	1086 1352	1	1086 1380	2	1086 1401	1	1086 1417	1	1086 1418	1	1086 1424	1	1086 1428	1	1086 1444	1	1086 1444	1	1086
